entry.value:
java_import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils java_import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.InputStreamCallback java_import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.OutputStreamCallback java_import Java::org.apache.nifi.processors.script.ExecuteScript import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets require 'json' require 'net/http'
def initialize_person_index req = Net::HTTP::Put.new('/person') json = <<-JSON { "mappings": { "properties": { "address": { "type": "nested" }, "phone": { "type": "nested" }, "email": { "type": "nested" }, "name": { "type": "nested" }, "race": { "type": "nested" } } } } JSON req.body = json req['Content-Type'] = 'application/json' resp = Net::HTTP.start('elasticsearch', 9200) { |client| client.request(req) } end
$person_by_uid = {} $phones_by_uid = {} $emails_by_uid = {} $names_by_uid = {} $races_by_uid = {} $addresses_by_uid = {}
def add_email(uid, person) emailAddress = person['emailAddress'] emailAddress = nil if emailAddress == '' return if emailAddress.nil? email = {"emailAddress": emailAddress&.downcase} emails_by_uid = $emails_by_uid[uid] if emails_by_uid $emails_by_uid[uid].append(email) unless emails_by_uid.include?(email) else $emails_by_uid[uid]=[email] end end
def add_race(uid, person) race_cd = person['race_cd'] race_desc_txt = person['race_desc_txt'] race_cd = nil if race_cd == '' race_desc_txt = nil if race_desc_txt == '' return if race_cd.nil? && race_desc_txt.nil? race = {"race_cd": race_cd, "race_desc_txt": race_desc_txt} races_by_uid = $races_by_uid[uid] if races_by_uid $races_by_uid[uid].append(race) unless races_by_uid.include?(race) else $races_by_uid[uid]=[race] end end
def add_phone(uid, person) telephoneNbr = person['telephoneNbr'] extensionTxt = person['extensionTxt'] telephoneNbr = nil if telephoneNbr == '' extensionTxt = nil if extensionTxt == '' return if telephoneNbr.nil? && extensionTxt.nil? phone = {"telephoneNbr": telephoneNbr, "extensionTxt": extensionTxt} phones_by_uid = $phones_by_uid[uid] if phones_by_uid $phones_by_uid[uid].append(phone) unless phones_by_uid.include?(phone) else $phones_by_uid[uid]=[phone] end end
def add_address(uid, person) streetAddr1 = person['streetAddr1'] streetAddr2 = person['streetAddr2'] city = person['city'] zip = person['zip'] cntyCd = person['cntyCd'] state = person['state'] cntryCd = person['cntryCd'] streetAddr1 = nil if streetAddr1 == '' streetAddr2 = nil if streetAddr2 == '' city = nil if city == '' zip = nil if zip == '' cntyCd = nil if cntyCd == '' state = nil if state == '' cntryCd = nil if cntryCd == '' return if streetAddr1.nil? && streetAddr2.nil? && city.nil? && zip.nil? && cntyCd.nil? && state.nil? && cntryCd.nil? address = {"streetAddr1": streetAddr1, "streetAddr2": streetAddr2, "city": city, "zip": zip, "cntyCd": cntyCd, "state": state, "cntryCd": cntryCd} addresses_by_uid = $addresses_by_uid[uid] if addresses_by_uid $addresses_by_uid[uid].append(address) unless addresses_by_uid.include?(address) else $addresses_by_uid[uid]=[address] end end
def add_name(uid, person) last_nm = person['last_nm'] middle_nm = person['middle_nm'] first_nm = person['first_nm'] nm_use_cd = person['nm_use_cd'] nm_suffix = person['nm_suffix'] nm_degree = person['nm_degree'] last_nm = nil if last_nm == '' middle_nm = nil if middle_nm == '' first_nm = nil if first_nm == '' nm_use_cd = nil if nm_use_cd == '' nm_suffix = nil if nm_suffix == '' nm_degree = nil if nm_degree == '' return if last_nm.nil? && middle_nm.nil? && first_nm.nil? && nm_suffix.nil? && nm_degree.nil? name = {"last_nm": last_nm, "middle_nm": middle_nm, "first_nm": first_nm, "nm_use_cd": nm_use_cd, "nm_suffix": nm_suffix, "nm_degree": nm_degree} names_by_uid = $names_by_uid[uid] if names_by_uid $names_by_uid[uid].append(name) unless names_by_uid.include?(name) else $names_by_uid[uid]=[name] end end
def process_person_row_from_db(person) uid = person['person_uid'] return unless uid unless $person_by_uid[uid] $person_by_uid[uid] = person end add_name(uid, person) add_race(uid, person) add_email(uid, person) add_phone(uid, person) add_address(uid, person) end
def delete_nested_keys_from_person_at_to_level(person) person.delete('streetAddr1') person.delete('streetAddr2') person.delete('city') person.delete('zip') person.delete('cntyCd') person.delete('state') person.delete('cntryCd')
person.delete('telephoneNbr') person.delete('extensionTxt')
person.delete('race_cd') person.delete('race_desc_txt')
person.delete('emailAddress')
person.delete('last_nm') person.delete('middle_nm') person.delete('first_nm') person.delete('nm_use_cd') person.delete('nm_suffix') person.delete('nm_degree') end
def convert_person_data_into_person_list_with_nested_fields $person_list = [] $person_by_uid.each do |uid, person| hash = person.dup hash['address'] = $addresses_by_uid[uid] hash['phone'] = $phones_by_uid[uid] hash['email'] = $emails_by_uid[uid] hash['name'] = $names_by_uid[uid] hash['race'] = $races_by_uid[uid] delete_nested_keys_from_person_at_to_level(hash) $person_list.append(hash) end $person_list end
class JRubyOutputStreamCallback include OutputStreamCallback def process(outputStream) person_list = convert_person_data_into_person_list_with_nested_fields data = person_list.to_json outputStream.write(data.to_java.getBytes(StandardCharsets::UTF_8)) end end
class JRubyInputStreamCallback include InputStreamCallback def process(inputStream) text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream) hash = JSON.parse(text) if hash hash.each do |person_hash| process_person_row_from_db(person_hash) end end end end
initialize_person_index jrubyInputStreamCallback = JRubyInputStreamCallback.new jrubyOutputStreamCallback = JRubyOutputStreamCallback.new flowFile = session.get() if flowFile != nil session.read(flowFile, jrubyInputStreamCallback) session.write(flowFile, jrubyOutputStreamCallback) session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript::REL_SUCCESS) end

SELECT distinct p.person_parent_uid person_uid, p.administrative_gender_cd, p.add_reason_cd, p.add_time, p.add_user_id, p.age_calc, p.age_calc_time, p.age_calc_unit_cd, p.age_category_cd, p.age_reported, p.age_reported_time, p.age_reported_unit_cd, p.as_of_date_admin, p.as_of_date_ethnicity, p.as_of_date_general, p.as_of_date_morbidity, p.as_of_date_sex, p.birth_gender_cd, p.birth_order_nbr, p.birth_time, p.birth_time_calc, p.cd, p.cd_desc_txt, p.curr_sex_cd, p.deceased_ind_cd, p.deceased_time, p.description, p.education_level_cd, p.education_level_desc_txt, p.electronic_ind, p.ethnic_group_ind, p.last_chg_reason_cd, p.last_chg_time, p.last_chg_user_id, p.marital_status_cd, p.marital_status_desc_txt, p.mothers_maiden_nm, p.multiple_birth_ind, p.occupation_cd, p.preferred_gender_cd, p.prim_lang_cd, p.prim_lang_desc_txt, p.record_status_cd, p.record_status_time, p.status_cd, p.status_time, p.survived_ind_cd, p.user_affiliation_txt, p.nm_prefix, p.preferred_nm, p.hm_street_addr1, p.hm_street_addr2, p.hm_city_cd, p.hm_city_desc_txt, p.hm_state_cd, p.hm_zip_cd, p.hm_cnty_cd, p.hm_cntry_cd, p.hm_phone_nbr, p.hm_phone_cntry_cd, p.hm_email_addr, p.cell_phone_nbr, p.wk_street_addr1, p.wk_street_addr2, p.wk_city_cd, p.wk_city_desc_txt, p.wk_state_cd, p.wk_zip_cd, p.wk_cnty_cd, p.wk_cntry_cd, p.wk_phone_nbr, p.wk_phone_cntry_cd, p.wk_email_addr, p.SSN, p.medicaid_num, p.dl_num, p.dl_state_cd, p.race_seq_nbr, p.race_category_cd, p.ethnicity_group_cd, p.ethnic_group_seq_nbr, p.ethnic_group_desc_txt, p.adults_in_house_nbr, p.children_in_house_nbr, p.birth_city_cd, p.birth_city_desc_txt, p.birth_cntry_cd, p.birth_state_cd, p.local_id, p.version_ctrl_nbr , p.group_nbr, p.group_time, p.edx_ind, p.speaks_english_cd, p.additional_gender_cd, p.ehars_id, p.dedup_match_ind, pn.last_nm, pn.middle_nm, pn.first_nm, pn.nm_use_cd, pn.nm_suffix, pn.nm_degree, pr.race_cd, pr.race_desc_txt, plx.streetAddr1, plx.streetAddr2, plx.city, plx.zip, plx.cntyCd, plx."state", plx.cntryCd, plt.locatorUid, plt.telephoneNbr, plt.extensionTxt, plt.emailAddress FROM Person p left join Person_name pn on p.person_uid=pn.person_uid left join person_race pr on p.person_uid=pr.person_uid left join ( select elpa.entity_uid elpa_entity_uid, pl.street_addr1 streetAddr1, pl.street_addr2 streetAddr2, pl.city_desc_txt city, pl.zip_cd zip, pl.cnty_cd cntyCd, pl.state_cd "state", pl.cntry_cd cntryCd from entity_locator_participation elpa, postal_locator pl where pl.postal_locator_uid=elpa.locator_uid and elpa.class_cd='PST' and elpa.status_cd='A' ) plx on elpa_entity_uid=p.person_uid left join( select elpt.entity_uid elpt_entity_uid, tl.tele_locator_uid locatorUid, tl.phone_nbr_txt telephoneNbr, tl.extension_txt extensionTxt, tl.email_address emailAddress from entity_locator_participation elpt, tele_locator tl WHERE tl.tele_locator_uid=elpt.locator_uid and elpt.class_cd='TELE' and elpt.status_cd='A' ) plt on elpt_entity_uid=p.person_uid WHERE p.person_parent_uid IS NOT NULL
